TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IntegerValidator extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase

span.span: Provides validation of an value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來確保整數符合特定準則。The class is used to ensure that an integer meets specific criteria. 執行個體時建立的準則驗證建立類別。The criteria for validation are established when an instance of the class is created. 具有兩個參數的建構函式可確保驗證中的整數遵守最小值和最大值。The constructor with two parameters ensures that the integer being verified adheres to both a minimum and a maximum value. 的最小值和最大值，具有三個參數的建構函式會檢查值，以及要驗證的值是否在指定範圍內。The constructor with three parameters checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the value to be validated is within the specified range. 四個參數的建構函式會檢查先前的三個參數，並也檢查是否值相當於特定的解析度。The constructor with four parameters checks the previous three parameters and also checks whether the value is equal to a specific resolution. 方法會判斷要驗證的物件型別是否符合預期的類型。The method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type. 正在驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的方法。The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用型別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the type. param.span: 表示指定驗證範圍為排除。

span.span: to specify that the validation range is exclusive.

param.span: 「內含」表示要驗證的值必須在指定的範圍內；「排除」表示值必須低於最小值或高於最大值。

span.span: Inclusive means the value to be validated must be within the specified range; exclusive means that it must be below the minimum or above the maximum.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立的執行個體時類別，這建構函式會檢查的最小值和最大值值，以及驗證範圍是否獨佔。When creating an instance of the class, this constructor checks both the minimum and maximum values, as well as whether the validation range is exclusive. 當`rangeIsExclusive`參數設定為`true`，則值之間不能`minValue`和`maxValue`參數值。When the `rangeIsExclusive` parameter is set to `true`, the value must not be between the `minValue` and `maxValue` parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 判斷物件的值是否有效。

span.span: Determines whether the value of an object is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件包含要驗證的整數物件所需的規則。An object contains the rules necessary to validate an integer object. 執行個體時，會建立規則建立類別。The rules are established when an instance of the class is created. 要驗證的整數物件會傳遞做為參數的方法。The integer object to validate is passed as a parameter of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.IntegerValidator#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.IntegerValidator/CS/IntegerValidator.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.IntegerValidator#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.IntegerValidator/VB/IntegerValidator.vb#4)]
